Question: This person lauded the pro-democracy struggles in Georgia and Ukraine.
Hints: This person entered office with the Dow Jones Industrial Average at 10,587, and the average peaked in October 2007 at over 14,000.
In 1998, this person won re-election with a record 69% of the vote.
In June 1999, while Governor of Texas, this person announced his candidacy for President of the United States.
